name: SWE Intern Grinders
description: For students aiming for top tech internships. Daily LeetCode check-ins and mock interview practice.

name: Data Science Wizards
description: A group for aspiring data scientists. We share datasets, work on Kaggle competitions, and build projects.

name: UX/UI Innovators
description: Daily design challenges, portfolio reviews, and sharing the latest trends in UI/UX.

name: Founder Fuel
description: For student entrepreneurs building their startups. Weekly goal setting and progress sharing.
